functions.name: avg
functions.details: This function takes as an argument any numeric data type or any nonnumeric data type that can be implicitly converted to a numeric data type. The function returns the same data type as the numeric data type of the argument.

functions.name: max
functions.details: This function takes as an argument any numeric data type or any nonnumeric data type that can be implicitly converted to a numeric data type. The function returns the same data type as the numeric data type of the argument.

functions.name: term
functions.details: This function takes as an argument a string which is a property name and an integer which is the number of most frequently occuring values in that proprty to display.

functions.name: histogram
functions.details: This function takes as an argument a string which is a property name and an integer which is the interval value to be used to bucketize the values taken by the property

functions.name: timeslice
functions.details: This function takes as an argument a string which is a date type property name and a string which is the interval time to be used to bucketize the values taken by the property
